A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie was too long and tremendously boring.  I consider myself a fanatic and it wrecks me that I hated this installment.

So many questions remain.  Who was Snoke?  Where are the Knights of Ren?  Why did Luke try to kill Kylo?  Who are Rey's parents?  Why did Yoda torch the Jedi texts?  Why did Luke have a map if he didn't want to be found?  Why did Luke lightsaber call to Rey?

So many irritating things about this movie exist.  Rose is worse than Jar Jar Binks.  Luke throws his "Lazer Sword" over his shoulder.  Luke is slightly unhinged.  Luke milks a elephant/walrus/cow.  Rey is automatically great at everything.  Leia can fly.  Chewie is a vegetarian.  And on and on.

If you haven't already\, don't spend one dime on this.  I will not go see Solo and I will likely not go see episode 9.  What Disney did to Star Wars is unforgiveable.
